subject: Baseball
Minor Leagues
Economic Conditions and Trends
Recession and Depression
lead_paragraph: At the minor league job fair and trade show, the topic on many minds was the floundering economy, which is expected to have a pronounced effect on baseball’s lower levels.
snippet: At the minor league job fair and trade show, the topic on many minds was the floundering economy, which is expected to have a pronounced effect on baseball’s lower levels.
